TextView.android:text:
This App will send you and email when someone use your mobile without your permission or even when someone steal your mobile the app will take a picture of this person and send them by mail and send their GPS location 
 to the email address you define here you have 
 * first to register your photo and 
 * register the people you expect to use the mobile
 * then the app will every time someone unlock the phone will check them without they knew or regard
 * that the app will work completely in the background and take the picture using the front camera in the background
 * don’t warry the app will consume vey very less amount of battery and processor
 * This app is completely free and open source this app is made available to you due to the efforts of international Biometrics Master team 
 * please visit the link to knew more about this master www.international-education-biometrics.org/
 * this was a small project required to be done for me as student in this master and I made it open source for other people to improve it and may be learn from it 
 * special thanks to Prof. Amine NAIT-ALI the head of the first International Master program of Biometrics
